channel.title: What requirements do you need?
channel.description:
Hi
I have a Server in a Datacenter, it has 3.2GHz Intel Dual Xeon CPU and 480mb RAM.
It has a 100mbps Internet connection (up/down)
but.. When I reach 45+ players - it starts to fail and stops..
Could it be the RAM? Im sure the CPU is fine, its a good high quality one..
How much RAM would you suggest?
